p: Nine notable cases that occurred in the past 5 years were selected for more in-depth analysis based on their strong public health linkages. These cases are listed and summarized in chronological order in Table 1, with indication of the number of times the word “health” (both human and environmental health) was used in the case document submitted to the court. The number of times the word “health” was explicitly used ranged widely from twice (case 6) to a maximum of 28 (case 4).
